com.sk89q.worldedit.regions

Interface Region

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<BlockVector>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    FlatRegion
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRegion, ConvexPolyhedralRegion, CuboidRegion, CylinderRegion, EllipsoidRegion, NullRegion, Polygonal2DRegion, RegionIntersection, RequestSelection, TransformRegion

    public interface Region
extends java.lang.Iterable<BlockVector>, java.lang.Cloneable
    Represents a physical shape.
